title: Error 403

title: Sort by multiple tags in bookmarks
content:
Hi,

I'm struggling with how to sort my many bookmarks. Not sure if a bookmark should be in a sub-directory and/or I add multiple tags. I've thought of adding them to generalized directories and then adding as many tags as needed, but am not able to search/select multiple tags in the Library window. Any pointers on what is a good way to do this?

I have things like Coding, Learning, Tools. But then also Git, PHP, Linux. I can't figure out how to sort all theseÂ :( Thanks for any input you may have.

Cheers.
creator: seedsca

title: Netflix saying, "Looks like your browser is no longer supported.  Error Code F7121-3078" after latest Widevine update
content:
I have the latest version of Firefox 78.15.0esr (64-bit) on my Macbook Pro. Netflix says, "Looks like your browser is no longer supported. Please install the latest version or install another browser. Error Code F7121-3078" (see image 1).

Netflix streaming works fine on Opera, but I can't get it working on Firefox, even though it was working fine on Firefox a couple of days ago (Sept 15, 2022). Any help you can offer would be appreciated very much. I have two plug ins: Facebook Container and EFF Privacy Badger. There is no update available to update Firefox. It appears that when the new version of Widevine updated yesterday (see image 2), the browser stopped working for streaming on Netflix. Widevine version 4.10.2209.1 (updated Sept 16, 2022).
creator: ramseyrabie

title: Account deletion: "password is incorrect" even after resetting
content: I try to delete my account and it requests a password. I put in my password and it claims that it is incorrect, even if I reset it specifically to fix this.
creator: keeganjk

title: Firefox Window Gets Smaller When Fullscreen
content:
See the iCloud link to the video: https://share.icloud.com/photos/0d3_aWWS8K4Lme-df7JUrFcvQ.

When Firefox is full screen, the size is fine. Eventually, the size gets smaller: the bezels on the right and left become bigger. The only way to fix is to restore the window to original size, then maximize again.
creator: jwacosta

title: lost access to e-mail account, can't login to firefox accounts
content: I have lost access to my e-mail account that I registered Firefox Accounts with and now I can't login to my Firefox account despite knowing the correct password because it insists on entering a code sent to the e-mail address I have no longer access to. Is there any way I can login to my Firefox account only with my current password to change my linked e-mail address? Or somehow ask support to change it for me manually? If none of that is possible, I want to, at the very least, deactivate or delete said account because I'm worried about the possibility of abuse.
creator: Hollo

title: Export Chrome bookmarks to FireFox
content:
